subject: ControlUp alert mail - Process Ended -  Process 3784 on DESDN01058 (StreamService.exe)
body:
This is an automated alert from ControlUp, which you requested to receive using an incident trigger. 

	
A process was terminated on one of your managed computers.


     Organization Name: Bitzer


     Trigger name: CITRIX PVS Services down <controlup://incidents/CITRIX PVS Services down> 


     Process name: StreamService.exe <controlup://incidents/StreamService.exe> 


     Process ID: 3784


     User name: BITZER\s00228 <controlup://incidents/BITZER\s00228> 


     Session ID: 0


     Computer name: DESDN01058 <controlup://incidents/DESDN01058> 


     Exit code: 0


     Incident timestamp (UTC +2 W. Europe Standard Time): 8/27/2025 8:59:44 AM



In order to configure which e-mail alerts you receive, please open ControlUp and edit the settings for the trigger specified above.
